Description:
Required Skills to be successful:Good communication and interpersonal skills 
Proactive and able to think outside of the box 
Product knowledge 
Understanding the needs of customers and knowing how we can assist
Ability to build strong relationships 
Strategic thinkingAbout the Team:You will be working in a diverse, fast paced team and reporting directly to the Used Sales Manager.What equips you for the role:3 to 8 years in heavy duty commercial vehicles sales 
Bachelor’s degree – Mechanical Engineering and MBA holders are preferable Job Details
